Rizraell:
Umm...hello. I... I'm Rizraell.
My therapist tells me I need to get out and talk to people more, so I'm trying. She tells me to think positive. Think positive. Sounds simple, but it's SO hard! I lost my brother to the plague, my axe fell down the well, and my barn burnt down last week! What's so positive about that?!
Blasted plague! Blasted fire! Blasted blasts! Argh! ... Oh, wait. Positive. Think positive. The people of Aden are nice. I should meet more of them... Hello. Have we met?
